channel.title: Snow Leopard on Ian Wootten
channel.description: Recent content in Snow Leopard on Ian Wootten

item.title: Installing MPlayer on Snow Leopard
item.description: Here’s a heads up for anyone installing MPlayer on Snow Leopard. I’ve been playing a fair amount with tools recently and inevitably ending up running round in circles in installing, compiling, setting flags etc. Here’s a quick one liner param for anyone compiling mplayer (and freetype as its dependency) which people on Snow Leopard may find useful. You’ll first need to download latest versions of freetype and mplayer. Uncompress both. cd freetype .
